metadata.fantasy-title: 盜火戰記 | by Kevin Hsu, 寫小說的工程師
metadata.fantasy-description: Kevin Hsu 的第一本長篇奇幻冒險故事。故事發生在一個以「魔豆」為經濟與魔法核心的中古世界。人類透過吃下魔豆來驅動魔法，因此能夠種植魔豆的貴族掌握了魔法與大多的資源。然而，在魔豆豐收祭典上，薩爾溫家族的魔豆田被偷了⋯⋯
metadata.spirit-smoke-title: 靈煙師 | by Kevin Hsu, 寫小說的矽谷工程師
metadata.spirit-smoke-description: 矽谷工程師回台灣奔喪，但誰曉得阿公的靈魂居然被妖怪綁架⋯⋯ 是我在國外想念阿公阿嬤的時候，創作出來的一個故事想法。
metadata.ai-title: Dear Human Sister... | by Kevin Hsu, 寫小說的矽谷工程師
metadata.ai-description: 2047 年，人類被代號「宙斯」的 A.I. 取代。身為宙斯開發者的人類女兒，也是「宙斯」的妹妹，瑟琳娜被人唾棄、排擠，只能浪跡天涯。可是，人類最後的希望也是她⋯⋯

home.project: <novel>《盜火戰記》</novel> is a long-form fantasy novel I’m currently writing. The story takes place in a medieval world where magic beans serve as the foundation of both the economy and magic. Humans consume these beans to harness magic, giving noble families who can cultivate them control over both magical power and most resources. However, during the grand Magic Bean Harvest Festival, the Salwen family’s bean fields are stolen…

about.title: Kai-Chun Hsu
about.subtitle: I write fantasy novels and iOS code.
about.introduction:
Hey, thanks for stopping by 😎



I grew up in Taipei, currently work as an software engineer at Meta in the SF Bay Area.



I'm passionate about opportunities serving & empowering creators to make a living while working on their creative pursuits. I myself wanted to be a novelist when I was a kid too.



Outside of work, I enjoy writing a lot. If that sounds interesting to you, you can read more about how I (re)started writing (about 2 years ago), my experience of a writing bootcamp, and my learnings from writing. I now write monthly blog posts, a fantasy novel (hoping to finish/publish it in 2025), and scoping out 2 more short stories for 2026.
